Class StockDemo

java.lang.Object
StockDemo
public class StockDemo extends Object
Demonstrate the StockManager and Product classes. The demonstration becomes properly functional as the StockManager class is completed.
Version:
2016.02.29
Author:
David J. Barnes and Michael KÃ¶lling.

  • Constructor Details

    • StockDemo

      public StockDemo()
      Create a StockManager and populate it with a few sample products.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public void main()
      Provide a very simple demonstration of how a StockManager might be used. Details of one product are shown, the product is restocked, and then the details are shown again.

    • showDetails

      public void showDetails(int id)
      Show details of the given product. If found, its name and stock quantity will be shown.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product to look for.

    • sellProduct

      public void sellProduct(int id)
      Sell one of the given item. Show the before and after status of the product.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product being sold.

    • getManager

      public StockManager getManager()
      Returns:
      The stock manager.
